title: kbhsec_website
text:
KbhSec is the Copenhagen branch of CitySec, a collection of informal meetups for like-minded security professionals.
CitySec groups meet to discuss topics of interest in a non-work, non-vendor setting; preferably while drinking (responsibly).
This website is built with Quarto, hosted on GitHub Pages. Source is available here.
